description:
EXPERIENCE FOOTBALL - ROAD TO QATAR
Your official gateway to the world’s most exciting football tournaments. This app is built for fans who want the game at their fingertips, fast, simple, and stress-free.

Discover videos from around the world and create your own with easy-to-use tools to capture your life. 

From your morning coffee to your evening commute, TikTok has the videos to make your day. Whether you’re a sports fanatic, a travel lover or simply looking for a laugh, there’s something for everyone on TikTok. Enjoy an endless stream of short videos on things you love most. Watch what you like, skip what you don’t. 
 
WATCH
A personalised video feed based on what you watch, like, and share. TikTok offers you real, interesting, and fun videos that will make your day.  You'll find a variety of videos from Food and Fashion to Sports and DIY - and everything in between.

 
CREATE
Pause and resume your video with just a tap. As many times as you need.
Millions of creators on TikTok showcase their incredible skills and every day life. Let yourself be inspired.
 
ENTERTAIN
Be entertained and inspired by a global community of creators.

Take video creation to the next level with special effects, filters, music, and more. Unlock filters, effects, and AR objects to take your videos to the next level.
 
CUSTOMISE
Our integrated editing tools allow you to easily edit your videos.
Trim, cut, merge and duplicate video clips without leaving the app.
 
ADD MUSIC
Add your favorite sound to your videos with millions of music clips and sounds. 
We curate music and sound playlists for you with the hottest tracks in every genre, including Hip Hop, EM, Pop, Rock, Rap, and Country, and the most viral original sounds.

Obtain access to LIVE benefits to better interact with hosts!
Choose between a one-month subscription or auto-renewal subscription to enjoy special LIVE benefits (currently only available in limited regions)

Note: 
If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to App Store Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of Service —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy —
https://www.tiktok.com/legal/privacy-policy

description:
GoodShort: a must-have app for original dramas and movies

To enjoy original short dramas and movies of a minute or so, anytime, anywhere, whether in travel, at home, or at a restaurant

We have a myriad of short dramas and movies adapted from novels with high quality, high definition, and high update frequency, guaranteeing a different screen experience for you.

[Diverse, all-inclusive content]
There are a lot of short dramas and reels adapted from novels, definitely something fascinating to you. From modern romance, urban romance, and youth romance to live-in sons-in-law, magic doctors, CEOs, billionaires, queens, and gods of war, all your favorite genres and themes can be found here!

[A personalized list of works you may like]
The excellent recommendation system will help you find the best originals, short dramas, and short movies adapted from the hottest novels, meeting the preferences of all kinds of drama and movie lovers!

[A user-friendly, elegant interface]
The simple, clear, user-friendly interface is an ergonomic fit for your eyes.

[Smooth experience]
Smooth streaming, as well as the comfortable interface design, will give you unparalleled viewing enjoyment. The high-quality content output provides a rich, high-definition, smooth, and flawless screen experience.

[Unlimited resources, super fast updates]
The selected, diversified content will satisfy your viewing needs for different content. Subscribe to your favorite works to keep up with the latest updates of your favorite dramas.

Whether you want to relax or pass the time while waiting, GoodShort is the best choice for you. Download it and start exploring!

About the Automatic Subscription Renewal:

1. Payment: After you confirm the purchase, the fee will be automatically charged to your Apple iTunes account.

2. Renewal: 24 hours before your subscription expires, the renewal fee will be automatically deducted from your Apple iTunes account. After the renewal payment is processed, your premium membership will be extended automatically.

3. If you want to unsubscribe, please open the iPhone "Settings"-->enter "iTunes Store and App Store"-->click "Apple ID", select "View Apple ID", go to the "Account Settings" page, click "Subscribe" choose GoodShort to unsubscribe. if you do not unsubscription at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period, this subscription will be automatically renewed.

We are looking forward to hearing your comments and ideas. Please email us at contact@goodshort.com

Platinumlist is built with you in mind.

What makes 'Joy Awards' truly special, as it does every year, is that the winners are chosen by the fans who love and cherish them. With the 'Joy Awards' App, it's you who will nominate and vote for your beloved stars and releases in Music, Cinema, Series, Directors, Sports, and Influencers, all for free!



You will nominate and cast your votes in two phases:




First Phase: Nominating Your Favorite Stars and Releases
In the nomination phase, which lasts for one month, you play a crucial role in shaping the competition. 
Here's where YOU come in – choose your favorite nominee from the names or titles listed in each category. If your top pick isn't there, don't worry! You have the chance to add your own favorite name or title, as long as it meets the terms and conditions: it should be a release or achievement from 2025. 
During the nomination phase, you can nominate only once for each category.
This phase eventually leads to the selection of the top four final nominees in each category, representing the stars and releases with the most nominations.
 
Second Phase: Voting for Your Favorite Stars and Releases
After the nominations have been counted, the voting phase begins with the top four nominees in each category, which also spans one month.
Here's where YOU make the difference – cast your votes for your favorite nominees. 
And a month later, the voting counts are gathered, leading to the grand reveal of the winners during the live "Joy Awards 2026" ceremony in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
During the voting phase, you can vote only once for each category.

EXPLORE – SAVE – REPEAT




We’re committed to saving you money in a fun, simple and enjoyable way. We’ve negotiated thousands of valuable discounts and freebies from local businesses in Qatar to list them in the Urban Point app. 

So, with Urban Point, tons of savings are at your fingertips. Just open the app, discover what’s nearby and find a new or favorite place to redeem your offers, and the best part is that the vouchers renew on the 1st of every month so that you can use your favorites again and again. 

Food & drink, beauty & health, fun & leisure, and retail & services categories have you covered on everyday expenses. 



GET FREE ACCESS

Ooredoo Shahry and Qatarna post-paid plans come with a free Urban Point subscription.



REUSE OFFERS

Vouchers renew on the 1st of every month so that you can reuse your favorites and accumulate real savings. Our “offers you can use again” section makes it easy to find those you’ve used in previous months.  



USE IT BY YOURSELF OR WITH OTHERS

You get vouchers that can be used by 2 people and for 1 person. 



BE INSPIRED

With new outlet locations added every month, there’s always something new to discover and excite you. 



USE 7 DAYS A WEEK

Offers are valid any day of the week; only minimal exclusions called “Black Out" days on public holidays apply.



TRACK YOUR SAVINGS

Track all the money you’ve saved in your “Purchase History” section inside the app.



JOIN THE COMMUNITY OF SMART SPENDERS

Join the FASTEST growing community of smart spenders in Qatar and don’t miss your chance to save hundreds if not thousands of riyals every month. Browse by popular categories, your personalized interests or what is close by to easily find what you want.  The most frequently used and loved vouchers among Urban Point members are those for burgers, pizza, coffee, ice cream and sweets.

The most popular areas for redemptions are Al Nasr Street, shopping centers around Doha such as City Center Mall, Villaggio Mall in Aziziyah, Mirqab Mall in al Saad, Souq Waqif, and other hot spots across the country.

Tired of never finishing a movie or paying for unused subscriptions? 

Watch ReelShort — Every Second is Drama

Say hello to ReelShort, a next-gen HD streaming short movie platform offering exclusive vertical TV mini series. Recognized by Times100 for our movie reels innovation in the entertainment industry, we're changing the way you watch movies with our one-minute short movie episodes that you can enjoy anytime, anywhere, all from the convenience of your phone with the ReelShort App.

Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Featured Shows:
[Don't Miss Me When I'm Gone] After losing my parents, I move in with my godmother, Aunt Sandra. I live under her roof with her two sons-the Miller brothers-surrounded by love and care. I think I’ll end up with one of them. But everything changes when the maid’s daughter, Lola, moves in. The Miller brother I love most breaks my heart into pieces. After I leave, they lose their minds trying to find me.

[Move Aside! I'm the Final Boss] Kingsley is the secret King of King's Corps and the richest man on Earth, but when he returns from the battlefield, his childhood sweetheart brutally dumps him, thinking he's a clown. How will the King of all men make her regret it?

Here's why you'll love ReelShort:

Bite-sized original movie shorts designed for on-the-go viewing
•Exclusive short movies with juicy vertical content that will keep you hooked
•New TV mini series added daily, with hundreds of new episodes each month
•Hollywood-quality entertainment, crafted for the big screen delivered to your small screen
•The first ever interactive live action short movies, where you decide what happens next
Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download ReelShort now!

---

Automatic Subscription Service Description
1. VIP Subscription Benefits & Plans: Core benefit is ad removal for a seamless experience. Subscription plans include weekly and annual options; ad removal privilege takes effect immediately upon successful subscription.

3. Auto-Renewal Rule: Your iTunes account will be automatically charged for renewal within 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. If the payment is successful, your subscription cycle will be extended by one full renewal period (e.g., 1 week for weekly plans, 1 year for annual plans).

4. Subscription Management: To manage auto-renewal or cancel your subscription:Go to your iPhone’s "Settings" → Tap "iTunes Store & App Store" → Click your "Apple ID" → Select "View Apple ID" → Navigate to the "Subscriptions" section.To cancel auto-renewal, turn off the feature at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle. If you cancel within the final 24 hours of the period, no additional charges will be incurred after the current cycle ends.

description:
Welcome to ShotShort!

Tired of endless scrolling and not knowing what to watch? ShotShort brings you a whole new way to enjoy entertainment — with high-quality short dramas designed for your busy life. Every episode is just a few minutes long, so you can dive into captivating stories anytime, anywhere, without the long commitment. Whether you’re commuting, on a coffee break, or relaxing before bed, ShotShort makes it easy to fit great storytelling into your day.

A World of Genres at Your Fingertips
From sweet and heartwarming romances to intense revenge thrillers, suspense-packed mysteries, family dramas, and even fantasy adventures — ShotShort has something for every mood. Our content library is always growing, giving you endless stories to explore. Love dramatic CEO romances, gripping werewolf tales, or emotional urban dramas? We’ve got it all, ready for you in cinematic HD quality.

Fresh Stories, Non-Stop
We add new episodes and series every week, so your watchlist will never run dry. Our intelligent recommendation system learns your tastes and guides you to your next favorite drama effortlessly — no more endless scrolling, just instant entertainment you’ll actually enjoy.

Immersive Viewing, Anywhere
Crystal-Clear HD Quality – Beautiful visuals and professional production bring every story to life.
Multilingual Subtitles – Enjoy dramas from around the world, in your language.
Sleek & Easy Navigation – Find what you want quickly, with an interface designed for effortless browsing.

Free to Enjoy, Your Way
ShotShort is completely free to watch, supported by ads so everyone can access our stories. Want an even smoother experience? An optional small subscription lets you remove ads entirely and watch without interruptions.

Why Choose ShotShort?
- Episodes just minutes long — perfect for on-the-go viewing
- New stories added weekly to keep things fresh
- Smart recommendations tailored to your interests
- Genres for every taste, from romance to fantasy
- Watch anytime, anywhere — all in stunning HD
Step into a world where big drama fits into small moments. With ShotShort, you’ll always have a new story waiting for you.

Download ShotShort today and start your next binge-worthy adventure — no matter how little time you have.

About Subscriptions
Auto-renewing subscription instructions:
1. Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
2. Renewal: Your Apple iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before the subscription expires, extending your access for another cycle upon successful payment.
3. Cancellation: To cancel auto-renewal, disable the function in your iTunes/Apple ID settings at least 24 hours before the current subscription ends. If canceled within the last 24 hours, a renewal fee may still apply.
4. For more information, please see: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Terms of Service: https://www.mediaradiance.com/service_clause.html
Renewal: https://www.mediaradiance.com/renewal_agreement/
If you have any questions, email us contact@mediaradiance.com~

Disney+ offers endless entertainment for everyone and every mood. With the world’s greatest stories from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic, plus general entertainment with Hulu, there's everything you imagined, plus more. Watch the latest blockbuster movies, award-winning original series, documentaries, classics, exclusive specials, all in one place.

Stream and download original series like Only Murders in the Building, Andor, and Daredevil: Born Again plus fan favourites including The Simpsons, Grey's Anatomy and Mufasa: The Lion King. With fresh stories added regularly, there's also something new to explore.

With Disney+, you get:

• Exclusive new originals from the creators of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic and Hulu
• Access to hit movies, throwbacks, and timeless classics 
• Easy-to-use parental controls for family-friendly viewing
• An ever-growing selection of titles in 4K (compatible equipment required)
• The capacity to watch on four screens at once at no extra cost
